data.text: @cat_932331 Hi there, can you give us more details? Is it concerning a hand luggage or a checked-in luggage? Is it delayed or was it forgotten? Please send us an PM. Kind regards, Daphne

@Loanil_HUN Hey Dominik, I am sorry to hear about your experience. Please let us know how we can help you.
Kind regards, Denis

@KercsmarMoor Hi Rita, we are sorry to learn that you have difficulties checking in. Please send us your booking code in a DM, we´ll be happy to take a closer look into this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @AJalooli @lufthansa Hi Armita, we are sorry to read that you have reason to complain. Please send us your booking code or your reference number in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into this matter. Kind regards, Dery https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @CAT_hartic [2/2] To bring your feedback to notice please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/H47kr4v9Jy. The respective colleagues will have a closer look at this matter. Kind regards, Derya
@CAT_hartic [1/2] Hi there, we are very sorry you had a poor experience on your previous Austrian flight, and thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us.

@cat_hartic [2/2]We are an internationally operating company and our staff is from all over the world. We cherish and love this multicultural climate very much. 
Best regards, Gayle

@cat_hartic [1/2]Hello there, 
apologies if you and your wife had that impression, however, we want to emphasize that we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism and discrimination.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @vcmarcano Hi, we're sorry to hear you had a negative experience. Please send your feedback via the following form: https://t.co/iSWK3YnzlN Kind regards, Lyndsay

@CAT_hartic Hi there, we kindly inform you that we have provided you with our decision upon this case. We already sent you an answer in October, 2021. 
Best regards, Denis

@QuiSconosciuto Hi Brian, please send us your claim reference number via DM, and we will take a closer look. Thank you!
Best regards, Denis
@Rafi_Farkas Hi, great to hear you enjoyed your flight! Kind regards, Lyndsay
@CAT_hartic Hi, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @CAT_hartic Hi there, I'm sincerely sorry to learn about this incident. Please accept my apologies for the inconvenience caused. To bring your concern to further notice, please send us all details via the respective online form: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko Best regards, Christiane
@eklow Hi, we apologize for the delay in processing your claim. Please send us your claim reference in a PM and we'll take a look for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@honas_music Hi Honas, we apologize for the delay in processing your claim. Please send us a PM with your case reference and we'll take a look for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Even though Vienna has officially been named the "world's most unfriendly city" yesterday, we easily make up for it with our smiles during your travel to Vienna. 😉✈️
#ServusVienna #ExpatCityRanking https://t.co/AeizF9Iw4p
@jilliancyork Hi Jillian, I'm sorry that you have this perception of our company. Is there something I can assist you with? Best regards Sandra

@bildungshipster Hi Thomas, es tut mir leid zu hören, dass dein Koffer nicht angekommen ist. Aktuell haben wir sehr viele Anfragen, darum dauert die Bearbeitung leider länger. Bitte schicke uns deine Fallnummer XXX-OS-XXXX in einer PM damit wir sie uns genauer ansehen können. Liebe Grüße, Petra

@davelake85 [2/2] We rather suggest you contacting the authorities at the LHR airport regarding this matter. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@davelake85 [1/2] Hi Dave, 
Thank you for getting in touch. Generally speaking, it is not a problem to take them with you. However, we are not able to assure you that you can wear them during the flight, as you have to pass the security control in LHR first.

@LorenaM18293368 [2/2]Please be informed that we have once again forwarded your request of handling your case with urgency. Please mind that our colleagues are working on it, we kindly ask for your patience and say thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@LorenaM18293368 [1/2] Hi Lorena, Please be informed that our respective colleagues are taking care of all the received submissions. We are sorry if the process takes longer than expected. All the claims are checked and handled individually in order to provide our guests with the best solution.

@Duygu_Oezkan Hallo Duygo, wir bedauern zu hören, dass du bis jetzt keine Rückmeldung erhalten hast. Bitte sende uns per PN deine Referenznummer, so dass wir den Erhalt und Status deines Feedbacks uns ansehen können. Die Referenznummer sollte wie gefolgt sein: 22XX OS XXXXX
Liebe Grüße, Shawn
@mtsullivn Hi Mike, there is an enormous amount of requests waiting to be answered hence the long delay, unfortunately. Best regards Sandra

data.text: @gudrun_lotze @lufthansa @Lufthansa_DE @FlySWISS @FlyingBrussels @Lufthansa_USA Hi Gudrun, please specify your issue. Otherwise, I'm not able to understand or explain what happened. Please send us a DM including your booking code. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra
@JSeelbach Guten Flug! ✈️

@albbbuh Hi Alba, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We, the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Petra

@frappu [1/2] Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We'll definitely take it to remind our team of our high-quality standards. The responsible department will bring this particular incident to the attention of the department manager and remind them of our service standards.

@frappu [2/2] We're sincerely sorry you didn't feel comfortable during your last flights with us and hope that your future travels will be much more convenient again.
Best regards, Shawn

data.text: Tomorrow, Monday 28 November, there will be no rail service due to a national strike in Austria. Please keep in mind that public transport to the airport is only possible with the rail replacement service of the City Airport Train or with the Vienna Airport Lines bus line! https://t.co/hjlQUu38Fn
@urbHaru Hi Haru, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@Ser1p Hi Sergii, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@simonpfc Hi Simon, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@FGreul Lieber Franz, vielen Dank für deine Aufmerksamkeit. Wir haben deine Beobachtung an die Fachabteilung weitergeleitet und werden uns bei dir melden. Liebe Grüße, Susi

urls.title: Flugstatus & Flugplan
urls.description: Wir wollen Sie rechtzeitig über unvorhergesehene Änderungen wie eine Verspätung informieren. Prüfen Sie Ihren Flugstatus und aktuelle Fluginformationen.

data.text: @christinaapap Hi, the departure is a little bit delayed but the arrival in Vienna should be on time again. You can find information about it via this link: https://t.co/06lbH0iBnv. Best regards, Susi
@Floojoe1 Hallo Floojoe, der Buchungsprozess ist sehr dynamisch, es kann alles passieren. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@Michael_Wippel Hi Michael, to investigate further we kindly ask you to send us your mail address in a DM so we can forward it to our responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Chris

sorry to hear you're still waiting. We kindly ask you for some more patience. Our colleagues are doing their best.

https://t.co/62YZ6n224l

data.text:
@EmilLayacan @AirCanada Dear Emil,
you can buy the necessary clothes/items for your stay, according to the general regulations, stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Please keep all receipts.

data.text: @Geraldi70410580 Hi Geraldine, thank you for reaching out. How can we help you? Please send us a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@Floojoe1 [2/2] Daher resultieren Preisschwankungen nach oben und unten. Bitte beachte, dass unsere Preisgestaltung den Marktgegebenheiten angepasst wird.
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@Floojoe1 [1/2] Hallo Floojoe, 
vielen Dank für deine Anfrage. Die Verfügbarkeit der Flüge und der daraus entstehenden Flugpreise ändert sich laufend, da Buchungen erstellt, Reservierungen gestrichen, Flüge umgebucht, Tickets zurückgegeben und Sonderaktionen angeboten werden.

@michael2526719 Hi Michael, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't delivered. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR, which you have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Petra

@tegralis_roger @MilesandMore_DE @dr_boese Hallo, es tut uns leid, dass du noch keine Antwort erhalten hast. Leider kommt es zurzeit zu längeren Bearbeitungszeiten. Unsere KollegInnen sind sehr bemüht, den entstandenen Rückstand aufzuarbeiten. Schicke uns gerne deine Fallnummer in einer DM. Liebe Grüße, Petra

@LorenaM18293368 Dear Lorena,
kindly send us your e-mail address in a DM. We'll send a note of urgency to the relevant department.
Best regards,
Alessandra

@AbdallahgalalAg Dear Abdallah,
If you feel unhappy about the response and wish that your other reasons for complaint should have been addressed as well, kindly revert back to Feedback Management for a more extensive reply. 
Best regards,
Alessandra

@bes85548054 Hello Bes, Thank you for your patience till now. We'll forward your reference number to our respective department with a note of urgency. Please be aware that even prioritized cases will need some time. Kind regards, Alessandra Liebe Grüße, Alessandra

@bes85548054 Hello Bes,
Thank you for your patience till now. We'll forward your reference number 2208-OS-08380 and 2208-OS-08381
to our respective department with a note of urgency. Please be aware that even prioritized cases will need some time.
Kind regards, Alessandra
@MarvSays Hello there @marvsays, kindly fill out the online form of Vienna Airport, as they are responsible for signage and bus transfer. https://t.co/ZyM0vt6dng Kind regards, Mia

@AbdallahgalalAg Hi Abdallah, we apologize again for any inconvenience caused. Having checked your case we have seen that our colleagues already contacted you several times via mail requesting additional data. Please reply directly back to them to finish your case. Kind regards, Chris

@Edbed19 Hi there, we're sincerely sorry that your luggage still has not been found. Unfortunately, there's nothing else the Social Media Team can do for you in this case as you've already filed all necessary forms. Our colleagues will get back to you asap. Best regards, Christiane
@revatarn_ Hi there, to be able to help you with your check-in issue we kindly ask you to send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @heidi_maurer [2/2]Vielen Dank, dass du uns dein ehrliches Feedback mitteilst. Um dein Feedback zur Kenntnis zu bringen, fülle bitte das folgende Kontaktformular aus https://t.co/H47kr4v9Jy. Wir freuen uns darauf, dir beim nächsten Mal ein reibungsloseres Erlebnis zu bieten. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@heidi_maurer [1/2]Hi Heidi, wir bedauern sehr, dass du auf deinem letzten Austrian-Flug eine schlechte Erfahrung gemacht hast und möchte uns aufrichtig dafür entschuldigen. Wir möchten, dass du weißt, dass dies nicht typisch für die Art von Service ist, den wir unseren Kunden bieten möchten.
@jay_vida [2/2] Rest assured that our colleagues will take care of your case as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya

@jay_vida [1/2]Hi Josh,  I have gladly retrieved your reference and noticed that your request was correctly forwarded to the respective department. Given the increased requests at the moment the processing time is above average.
@jay_vida Hi Josh, if you already sent your request via our online form please share the reference number of your case in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@juliahobsbawm Hi Julia, please use the link attached in order to contact us via DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@juliahobsbawm Hi Julia, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Did you already file the missing luggage report? Kind regards, Derya
@PeterMTauber1 @pichsenmeister [2/2] schnell wie möglich abzuarbeiten. Wir wissen eure anhaltende Geduld zu schätzen. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@PeterMTauber1 @pichsenmeister [1/2]Hallo Peter, es tut uns sehr leid, dass deine Anfrage noch nicht fertig bearbeitet werden konnte. Wir wissen, dass wir unseren Kunden gerade viel Geduld abverlangen. Jedoch kann ich dir versichern, dass unsere KollegInnen ihr Bestes geben jede Anfrage so sorgfältig und so

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Antagonist_dude Hi there, depending on your request you will find all our online forms via the following link https://t.co/FFefe711q1 Kind regards, Chris

@louistelemachou Hi Louis, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@pichsenmeister Hallo David, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du noch keine Antwort bekommen hast. Eine genau Beantwortungszeit können wir dir leider nicht sagen, da wir in den letzten Monaten sehr viele Anfragen bekommen haben und sich die Bearbeitungszeit leider verzögert. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@flyifyoucan_com HI there!
Unfortunately, we cannot tell you a specific time of response, since your case has to be handled by various different departments. 
You are welcome to DM us your reference number. We'll send a not of urgency to our colleagues.
Kind regards,
Alessandra

@tristan_mnz Hello Triste,
we kindly ask you to rephrase your request in English or German.
We'd like to help.
Best regards, Alessandra

@vagelis_h Hi there,
If you feel unhappy about the response and wish that your other reasons for complaint should have been addressed as well, kindly revert back to my colleagues from Feedback Management for a more extensive reply. 
Best regards,
Alessandra

@jay_vida  Josh, we are sorry you feel this way.😌
How can we prove you wrong?
Best regards,
Alessandra
@mxnelle Hi, you can send the invoices to the same online form to inquire about a reimbursement. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @mxnelle Hi there, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek compensation by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@harvey_chow @Apple Hi Harvey, unfortunately, we have no way of speeding up that process and cannot advise a specific time frame. Thank you for your patience.
Kind regards, Denis
@wilcouk Hi Adam, we're sorry that she had  a bad experience flying with us. Please send us a PM if you want to tell us more of what happened. Kind regards, Daphne

Mit Austrian Airlines findet das #Friedenslicht heute zum 36. Mal seinen Weg nach Wien!🕯️Das Friedenslichtkind Sarah entzündet die Flamme in Betlehem.❤️Wir sind stolz, dass wir als Unternehmen seit der ersten Stunde, Teil dieser langjährigen Tradition sind.✈️ https://t.co/KIJhtbopb0

urls.title: Lounges at Vienna Airport
urls.description: Experience typical Austrian charm in the Austrian Airlines lounges. We look forward to your visit.

data.text:
@simonpfc Hi Simon,
you can find the information under this link:
https://t.co/3wKJtQsXk1
Feel free to reach out if you have further questions or clarifications.
Best regards
Alessandra

@drsoffee Hi there, please rest assured my colleagues will contact you as soon as possible. Unfortunately, responses of Customer Relations are currently delayed due to the extraordinarily high volume of incoming inquiries. My apologies for the time waiting.
Best regards, Denis

data.text: @AlsoGrateful Hi there, we are very sorry to hear that you had a reason for criticism and were not happy with the meal served. Please do not hesitate to send us your feedback via https://t.co/KnyUJUVZRO. We hope we´ll meet your taste on your future flights with us. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @LyneHey Hi there, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. As already explained, Lufthansa is responsible for the handling of your case. We are therefore unfortunately not able to assist you any further. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
